name: ghostkatz
help: Dump LSASS credentials via signed vulnerable kernel drivers using physical memory read primitives
long_help:
GhostKatz extracts LSASS credentials directly from physical memory by exploiting signed
vulnerable kernel drivers (BYOVD), bypassing traditional user-mode detection.

PRE-REQUISITES:
  - Session must have administrator/SYSTEM privileges
  - Upload the appropriate driver to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\ before execution:
      Provider 1 (default): drivers/tpwsav.sys   (Toshiba TPwSav)
      Provider 2:           drivers/throttlestop.sys (TechPowerUp ThrottleStop)

USAGE:
  ghostkatz <mode> [provider]

EXAMPLES:
  ghostkatz logonpasswords
  ghostkatz logonpasswords 2
  ghostkatz wdigest
  ghostkatz wdigest 2

PROVIDERS:
  ID  Vendor        Driver           SHA256
  1   Toshiba       tpwsav.sys       011df46e94218cbb2f0b8da13ab3cec397246fdc63436e58b1bf597550a647f6
  2   TechPowerUp   throttlestop.sys 16f83f056177c4ec24c7e99d01ca9d9d6713bd0497eeedb777a3ffefa99c97f0
